comments.author: Helba.1734
comments.body:
Hi there,

Any chance a Single-Sign-On login in the form of CAS is possible for guildwars2 players?

TL;DR

1 – players auth with arenanet
2 – … some ticket validations …
3 – anet redirects to web/service with information about player (guilds? ranks? points/…)
4 – 3rd party service is able to use that information to authorize players for e.g. a guild-hosting provider or the like

See CAS: http://www.jasig.org/cas/protocol#introduction
